changes.description: Converted InstagramProfileDto from interface to class with validation decorators

username_field_verified.description: InstagramProfileDto has username field with @IsString() and @ApiProperty() decorators

profile_picture_url_field_verified.description: InstagramProfileDto has profile_picture_url field with @IsUrl() and @ApiProperty() decorators

validation_decorators_added.description: All fields now have appropriate class-validator decorators (@IsString, @IsUrl, @IsNumber, @IsBoolean, @IsEnum, @IsOptional)

swagger_decorators_added.description: All fields have @ApiProperty() decorators with proper descriptions and metadata

unitTests.reason: No unit tests exist for DTOs in this project pattern

integrationTests.reason: DTO verification task does not require integration tests

improvements: Converted from interface to class for runtime validation
Added class-validator decorators for all fields
Used @IsUrl() for URL validation with custom error messages
Maintained backward compatibility with existing code

notes: File was converted from TypeScript interface to class to support runtime validation
All existing fields maintained with same names and types
Added enum for AccountType to enforce valid values
Build successful with no compilation errors
